column4: In light of the Ethics in Public Office (Amendment) Bill 2007, will provision be made by the Government by way of an amendment or otherwise for the definition of a personal political donation or a political donation for personal purposes?
As the Minister for Health and Children is present, may I ask her whether she will make a statement as to when the acute hospitals review will be published?
It has serious permutations for hospitals at Mallow, Nenagh and Ennis.
